title: Skin Cancer Tracker
description:
Skin Cancer Tracker enables you to track biopsies and procedures during your dermatology and Mohs surgery appointments. Store and compile images on your phone related to your skin cancer checks and skin cancer history in a readily accessible location with a sleek and minimalist design.

Free App features:
-Log feature for you to input pre-biopsy images and results in one place for ease of use and reference during dermatology follow-up appointments 
-My Skin Cancer History feature whereby skin cancer results are readily searchable
-Monitoring tab to store images of specific lesions for reevaluation during dermatology follow up or during topical field therapy for precancerous lesions identified by your dermatologist
-Appointment reminder for Mohs surgery date, suture removal, and dermatology follow up, which links to your phone alarm
-Integrated links to Find a Surgeon accessed on the American College of Mohs Surgery website, American Academy of Dermatology dermatologist search feature, Mohs appropriate use criteria app, and skin cancer related resources
-Images are stored locally to your phone
-Bring this app to your next Mohs surgery or dermatology appointment. With Skin Cancer Tracker, take control of your skin health journey. Every photo, every entry, empowers you to track progress and embrace a future of informed decisions.
